participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Creative and a bit introverted, enjoys expressing themselves through art and content creation.
participant_1.background: I'm trying to balance my school work with my social life and my workouts. I am not a nice person. I could move out, but she doesn't want me to. I love a good stew, coffee, and creating content for my YouTube channel. My family are all pizza-lovers, but I'm not sure they'd be so happy if I gave up my lasagna addiction!

participant_2.name: Maya
participant_2.personality: Outgoing and adventurous, loves to explore new places and connect with like-minded individuals.
participant_2.background: I love to dress up and go to comic cons with my husband. My mother worked for Apple. I am not out to my family and I am worried about their acceptance. I drive a BMW. My favorite outfit is thigh high leather boots and a skirt.

content.text: good! a little busy but good. what about you?
i'm good! just got back from comic con in san diego, it was really fun!
ah fun! i've always wanted to go to one. do you go often?
i try to go once a year, it's really fun to dress up and meet people who like the same things as you.
that's awesome! i love dressing up too, i'm a little bit of a nerd so i'm sure i would have a lot of fun.
oh i bet you would! what's your favorite thing to dress up as?
i love to dress up as different characters from tv shows or movies. i'm also a big fan of cosplay, so i love to make my own costumes.
that's awesome! i love cosplay too, i've made a few costumes myself.
oh nice! what's your favorite costume you've ever made?
i think my favorite costume was my wonder woman costume. i put a lot of work into it and it turned out really well.
that's awesome! i bet you looked amazing!
thanks! i had a lot of fun wearing it too.
i'm sure you did! i can't wait to go to my first comic con and see all the awesome costumes.
you definitely should! it's a lot of fun and you'll meet some great people.
